name: PR Protector
description:
You are hired as employee #843021 in the PR department at Peterson, Kain, and Cousins; your job is to protect the brand AT ALL COSTS.

Recommended to play in fullscreen.

There are currently 6 levels (days).

Made for the Fireside Game Jam 2022 by:

  • Mari Locsin
  • Sarah Schulte
  • Jesse Mendez
  • Brian Chrzanowski

Special thanks to Daniel Linssen for the m5x7 font.
